SEARCH
Package oop2.jeopardy.game

Class GameRecord

java.lang.Object
oop2.jeopardy.game.GameRecord
public class GameRecord extends Object
Represents a single record of a player's action in the game. Stores details including the player, question, answer, correctness, points earned, and running score.

Used primarily by GameHistory for logging, reporting, and scoreboard calculations.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Kadie Bisnath - 816036090

      category - the question's category
